717683f-a.title: Manhattan: Broadway - 87th Street (West)
717683f-a.text:
Broadway, north from West 87th Street, showing construction work
in progress on the Interborough Rapid Transit Co. subway. The 7-story
building on the left is the Metropolitan Apartments, at the S.W. corner
of West 88th Street.
March 19, 1901.
Board of Transportation.Photograph.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.
William B. Parsons Collection.
NEG ~ 3950
